author: Yvette Brend
description: A growing chorus of women are demanding better education and pain management for those who experience discomfort during the insertion of the tiny T-shaped birth control devices known as IUDs.
title: Women have sucked up the pain of birth control devices for decades, but do they have to?
content:
When she was in her late 20s, Katie O'Byrne heard about a newer product that promised to eliminate all pregnancy risk without needing to remember to take a birth control pill each day.
